Design Mike Amundsen: Designing APIs with API Story Documents

(10) What is API Design : Summary

  • Defines your API
  • Gives meaning/purpose to your work
  • Acts as a guide while building
  • Provides a reference for users


API Stories

Outline (API Stories)

  1. Introduction [1]
  2. Design [6]
  3. API Stories [14]

API Stories Mike Amundsen: Designing APIs with API Story Documents

(12) API Stories

  • Design process guidance
  • Shared understanding (across teams)
  • Structured MD document


API Stories Mike Amundsen: Designing APIs with API Story Documents

(13) API Story Example

  • IMAGE OF STORY DOCUMENT WITH LINK


API Stories Mike Amundsen: Designing APIs with API Story Documents

(14) API Story Elements

  • Purpose
  • Properties
  • Resources
  • Actions
  • Rules


API Stories Mike Amundsen: Designing APIs with API Story Documents

(15) API Story : Purpose

  • Simple statement
  • Shareable
  • Repeatable
  • Sets scope and audience


API Stories Mike Amundsen: Designing APIs with API Story Documents

(16) API Story : Purpose : Example

  • EXAMPLE IMAGE


API Stories Mike Amundsen: Designing APIs with API Story Documents

(17) API Story : Properties

  • Data points for the API
  • Includes storage and query properties
  • Provides clear list and definition
  • Chance to reuse shared properties


API Stories Mike Amundsen: Designing APIs with API Story Documents

(18) API Story : Properties : Example

  • EXAMPLE IMAGE


API Stories Mike Amundsen: Designing APIs with API Story Documents

(19) API Story : Resources

  • "Resting places" for your API
  • Typically organized as HOME, COLLECTION, ITEM
  • Each resource is a 'state'
  • States return both properties and actions


API Stories Mike Amundsen: Designing APIs with API Story Documents

(20) API Story : Resources : Example

  • EXAMPLE IMAGE


API Stories Mike Amundsen: Designing APIs with API Story Documents

(21) API Story : Actions

  • The things clients can do at each resource
  • CRUD actions
  • Filters
  • Custom Actions (e.g. markComplete)


API Stories Mike Amundsen: Designing APIs with API Story Documents

(22) API Story : Actions : Example

  • EXAMPLE IMAGE


API Stories Mike Amundsen: Designing APIs with API Story Documents

(23) API Story : Rules

  • Limits on some actions
  • Usually implemented behind the interface
  • Examples:
    • ID must be unique
    • Customers cannot have duplicate accounts


API Stories Mike Amundsen: Designing APIs with API Story Documents

(24) API Story : Rules : Example

  • EXAMPLE IMAGE


API Stories Mike Amundsen: Designing APIs with API Story Documents

(25) API Story : Summary

  • Structured MD
  • Purpose, Properties, Resources, Actions, Rules
  • Design guidance, shared understanding

Exercise Mike Amundsen: Designing APIs with API Story Documents

(27) API Stories Exercise

  • Create an API Story Document
  • Complete sections
    • Purpose (single statement)
    • Properties (data points)
    • Resources (home, collection, item)
    • Actions (list, readItem, add, editItem, removeItem)
    • Rules (optional)
